description:
Yukinojo attends kabuki practice as usual. However, his father Kikuemon has some harsh words for him and demands that he quit performing Prism Shows. While waiting for Yukinojo to return to the dorm, Shin recalls the events of the Prism King Cup. Why did Yukinojo let him take his place...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 太刀花ユキノジョウ いざ, 参る!
